name: Kraterios, Etherym of Emptiness
text: 2 level 5 Etherym monsters You can also Xyz summon this card using 1 Etherym Xyz monster you control. You can target 1 of your Etherym monsters in the banishment, attach it to this card as Xyz material. If your opponent activates a monster effect: (quick effect) you can detach 2 Xyz material from this card; negate that effect and, if the monster is currently on the field, attach that card to this monster as Xyz material. (quick effect) You can banish 1 monster from your GY; banish this card until the next end phase. You can only activate each effect of "Kraterios, Etherym of Emptiness" once per turn.
